labels.analysis: The MCP Server is designed specifically for managing Todoist tasks, projects, and related elements through natural language commands. It provides a comprehensive set of tools for creating, updating, completing, and organizing tasks in bulk, as well as managing projects, sections, labels, comments, and subtasks. The server enhances productivity by integrating Todoist's functionality directly into a workflow, allowing for efficient task management with rich attributes and bulk operations.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality of this server revolves around task and project management within Todoist, which aligns closely with the "Daily Productivity" category. Additional secondary labels like "File Management" and "Database Operations" could be relevant as the server deals with data organization and manipulation, but the core purpose is productivity enhancement through task management. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories sufficiently cover its functionality.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Todoist Task Manager
server_info_crawled.author: @greirson/mcp-todoist
server_info_crawled.overview: Manage your Todoist tasks, projects, and comments seamlessly using natural language commands. Create, update, complete, and organize tasks and projects efficiently with support for bulk operations and rich task attributes. Enhance productivity by integrating Todoist task management directly into your workflow.

tools.name: todoist_task_create
tools.description: Deploy Server Todoist Task Manager @greirson/mcp-todoist Try in Playground todoist_task_create

tools.name: todoist_task_get
tools.description: Retrieve tasks from Todoist with optional filtering or get a specific task by ID

tools.name: todoist_task_update
tools.description: Update an existing task found by ID or partial name search. Supports updating content, description, due date, priority, labels, deadline, project, and section

tools.name: todoist_task_delete
tools.description: Delete a task found by ID or partial name search (case-insensitive)

tools.name: todoist_task_complete
tools.description: Mark a task as complete found by ID or partial name search (case-insensitive)

tools.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_create
tools.description: Create multiple tasks at once for improved efficiency. Each task can have full attributes like individual task creation.

tools.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_update
tools.description: Update multiple tasks at once based on search criteria. Very efficient for updating many tasks with the same changes.

tools.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_delete
tools.description: Delete multiple tasks at once based on search criteria. Use with caution - this will permanently delete matching tasks.

tools.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_complete
tools.description: Complete multiple tasks at once based on search criteria. Efficiently mark many tasks as done.

tools.name: todoist_project_get
tools.description: Get a list of all projects from Todoist with their IDs and names

tools.name: todoist_section_get
tools.description: Get a list of sections within a project from Todoist with their IDs and names

tools.name: todoist_project_create
tools.description: Create a new project in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_section_create
tools.description: Create a new section within a project in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_comment_create
tools.description: Add a comment to a task in Todoist by task ID or task name

tools.name: todoist_comment_get
tools.description: Get comments for a task or project in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_label_get
tools.description: Get all labels in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_label_create
tools.description: Create a new label in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_label_update
tools.description: Update an existing label in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_label_delete
tools.description: Delete a label from Todoist

tools.name: todoist_label_stats
tools.description: Get usage statistics for all labels in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_subtask_create
tools.description: Create a new subtask under a parent task in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_subtasks_bulk_create
tools.description: Create multiple subtasks under a parent task in a single operation

tools.name: todoist_task_convert_to_subtask
tools.description: Convert an existing task to a subtask of another task

tools.name: todoist_subtask_promote
tools.description: Promote a subtask to a main task (remove parent relationship)

tools.name: todoist_task_hierarchy_get
tools.description: Get a task with all its subtasks in a hierarchical structure

tools.name: todoist_test_connection
tools.description: Test the connection to Todoist API and verify API token validity

tools.name: todoist_test_all_features
tools.description: Run comprehensive tests on all Todoist MCP features to verify functionality

tools.name: todoist_test_performance
tools.description: Measure performance and response times of Todoist API operations

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@greirson/mcp-todoist/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
